name: The Adventurer - Episode 1: Beginning of the End
description: Imagine if every time you fall asleep new adventure awaits you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Pentium4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any integrated card with 512mb DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: integrated card with 1GB DirectX: Version 11
